name: Triggers King’s Rock
description: This move can trigger the effects of King’s Rock.

name: Accuracy check
description: This move uses the standard accuracy check.

name: Makes contact
description: This move causes the user to make contact with the target.

name: Blocked by Protect
description: This move will not work if the target has used Protect or Detect this turn.

name: Reflectable
description: This move can be reflected back at the user with Magic Coat or Magic Bounce.

name: Snatchable
description: The effects of this move can be stolen by a Pokémon using Snatch.

name: Copied by Mirror Move
description: This move can be copied by Mirror Move.

name: Has a charging turn
description: This move has a charging turn that can be skipped with a Power Herb.

name: Must recharge
description: The turn after this move is used, the Pokémon's action is skipped so it can recharge.

name: Punch-based
description: This move has 1.2× its usual power when used by a Pokémon with Iron Fist.

name: Sound-based
description: Pokémon with Soundproof are immune to this move.

name: Unusable during Gravity
description: This move cannot be used in high Gravity.

name: Defrosts when used
description: This move can be used while frozen to force the Pokémon to defrost.

name: Targets opposite side in triples
description: In triple battles, this move can target Pokémon on the opposite side from the user.

name: Heals
description: This move is blocked by Heal Block.

name: Ignores Substitute
description: This move ignores the target's Substitute.

name: Unusable during Sky Battles
description: This move is unusable during Sky Battles.

name: Ally Animation
description: This move's animation plays when it targets an ally.

name: Dance
description: This move triggers Dancer.

name: Metronome
description: This move can be called by Metronome.

name: Cures Drowsy
description: This move cures drowsiness for the user and the target.

name: Cures Frostbite
description: This move cures frostbite for the user and the target.

name: fail-encore
description: The move Encore will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: fail-me-first
description: The move Me First will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: future-attack
description: This move triggers an attack in the future.

name: pressure
description: This move is affected by the ability Pressure, even if it doesn't target that Pokémon.

name: combo
description: This move can be part of a combo.

name: no-sleep-talk
description: This move cannot be selected by Sleep Talk.

name: no-assist
description: This move cannot be selected by Assist.

name: fail-copycat
description: The move Copycat will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: fail-mimic
description: The move Mimic will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: fail-instruct
description: The move Instruct will fail if this move was used last by its target.

name: powder
description: Grass-type Pokémon, Pokémon with the ability Overcoat, and Pokémon holding Safety Goggles are immune to this move.

name: bite
description: This move's power is boosted by the ability Strong Jaw.

name: bullet
description: This move has no effect on Pokémon with the ability Bulletproof.

name: no-multi-hit
description: This move will not be duplicated by the ability Parental Bond.

name: no-effectiveness
description: This move will not display as "super effective" or "not very effective."

name: sheer-force
description: This move's power is boosted by the ability Sheer Force regardless of having a traditional secondary effect.

name: slicing
description: This move's power is boosted by the ability Sharpness.

name: wind
description: This move activates the abilities Wind Rider and Wind Power.

name: cant-use-twice
description: This move cannot be used twice in a row.

name: no-sketch
description: The move Sketch will fail if this move was used last by its target.
